CustomField.description: Enter a number of days and enable the Create Deadline Reminder Event setting. This allows ‘agreement about-to-expire alerts’ to be shown to your users in Salesforce. Alerts are shown the specified number of days before agreement expiration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a number of days and enable the Create Deadline Reminder Event setting. This allows ‘agreement about-to-expire alerts’ to be shown to your users in Salesforce. Alerts are shown the specified number of days before agreement expiration.
CustomField.label: Days Sign Deadline Reminder Event
